Channel3News-SurvingAnActiveShooterW/Kra.name: Channel 3 News - Surving an Active Shooter w/Krav Maga
Channel3News-SurvingAnActiveShooterW/Kra.summary: East Valley Krav Maga demonstrates some strategies and tactics for surviving an active shooter scenario and saving lives.

KravMaga:TheFightAgainstAnti-SemitismThr.name: Krav Maga: The fight against Anti-Semitism through self-defense martial arts
KravMaga:TheFightAgainstAnti-SemitismThr.summary: Anti-Semitic attacks throughout the country have led many in the Jewish community to find ways of protecting themselves using self-defense methods like the ones taught at Englewood Krav Maga.

ManyTurningToKravMagaClassesAsAnti-Semit.name: Many Turning to Krav Maga Classes as Anti-Semitism Increases
ManyTurningToKravMagaClassesAsAnti-Semit.summary: Across New York City, hate crimes are on the rise. According to the NYPD, there's been a triple-digit increase in the number of anti-semitic attacks since last year.Many jewish people, feeling the surge of hate after the war in Gaza began last October,but now some are standing up and fighting back.
